ur: Excavated by Leonard Woolley (1922-1934). Royal tombs with gold, jewelry, human sacrifice. Great Ziggurat of Ur still stands — dedicated to moon god Nanna. Flood layer found in strata.
canaan_sites: Shechem, Bethel, Hebron — all have Middle Bronze Age remains (Abraham's era). Altars and city gates match patriarchal period.
beer_sheba_well: Deep stone-lined well at Tel Beer Sheva, Israel. Attributed to patriarchal period. Abraham dug wells and made treaty with Abimelech here (Genesis 21). Well still visible and functional today — tourists can draw water.
timeline: Middle Bronze Age I (2000-1800 BCE). Matches biblical chronology. No anachronisms in Genesis account (camels, Philistines, prices in silver shekels all correct for era).
